manuals.name: Mint Diko
manuals.description: This manual uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast a transaction calling the arkadiko-alex-dual-yield-v1-1 contract's mint-diko function.

manuals.name: Governance
manuals.description: This runbook uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast a transaction calling the arkadiko-governance-v4-2 contract's propose function with AIP 15 arguments.

manuals.name: Simple Contract Call
manuals.description: This runbook uses your browser wallet to sign and broadcast the example-fruit-vote-contract contract's vote function.
